name: Piko-piko: Koisuru Kimochi no Nemuru Basho
storyline:
The story takes place in the near future. As globalization swept the world, almost all of industries in Japan declined. One and only industry that survived is moe industry and Japanese people get together and work hard to develop moe industry.

Meanwhile, a consumer game console is invented. That is called "Consumer Doll". It is just a game console, yet it has a lot of functions...
summary: The story takes place in the near future. As globalization swept the world, almost all of industries in Japan declined. One and only industry that survived is moe industry and Japanese people get together and work hard to develop moe industry.
